entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 23. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Blowing snow at times in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
